constructor-arg.value: case when $(tableAlias)"$(columnName)" is null then '''' else ''"''||replace(replace($(tableAlias)"$(columnName)",''\'',''\\''),''"'',''\"'')||''"'' end

property.name: functionInstalledSql
property.value: select count(*) from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.FUNCTION_ALIASES where ALIAS_NAME='$(functionName)'

entry.value: CREATE ALIAS IF NOT EXISTS $(functionName) for "org.jumpmind.symmetric.db.EmbeddedDbFunctions.encodeBase64";

property.name: blobColumnTemplate
property.value: case when $(tableAlias)"$(columnName)" is null then '''' else ''"''||replace(replace($[sym.sync.table.prefix]_BASE64_ENCODE($(tableAlias)"$(columnName)"),''\'',''\\''),''"'',''\"'')||''"'' end

property.name: numberColumnTemplate
property.value: case when $(tableAlias)"$(columnName)" is null then '''' else ''"''||cast($(tableAlias)"$(columnName)" as varchar(50))||''"'' end

property.name: datetimeColumnTemplate
property.value: case when $(tableAlias)"$(columnName)" is null then '''' else ''"''||formatdatetime($(tableAlias)"$(columnName)", ''yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S'')||''"'' end

property.name: booleanColumnTemplate
property.value: case when $(tableAlias)"$(columnName)" is null then '''' when $(tableAlias)"$(columnName)" then ''"1"'' else ''"0"'' end
